mapper.insert: insert into members(userid, username, userpwd, profile, token) values(#{userid},#{username},#{userpwd},#{profile}, #{token})
mapper.select: select userid, username , userpwd, isdelete,profile, token from members WHERE isdelete = true;
mapper.update: update members set userpwd = #{userpwd}, username = #{username}, profile = #{profile} where userid = #{userid}
mapper.delete: update members set isdelete = 1 where userid = #{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into courselist (userid, contentid, groupno) values (#{userid}, #{contentid}, #{groupno})
mapper.select: select groupno from courselist order by groupno desc limit 1;
